A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A really well done film. Luke - and the Jedi in general - are given a more human face (even if he isn't the infallible space Jesus some were hoping to see)\, Kylo and Rey both develop\, the battles are fantastic and the characters believable.

Kylo in particular dominates this movie - well done to Adam Driver.

The negatives for me are fairly nit-picky. If you can ram people at light speed\, why has it never been done? Like against the Death Star? The Pharma/Finn confrontation lacked any impact\, and I would liked a little more on Smoke and how he got to Kylo in the first place.
